user.name: Wyatt Scott
user.bio: Interested in deep learning, automation, and geopolitics.

node.name: WordsofWar
node.description: This repository hosts the code and report for a Deep Learning project on classifying US Presidential speeches based on whether they occurred within one year of the US entering a major war.

node.name: Data-Mining-for-Disaster-Relief
node.description: This repository hosts code and a final report on utilizing classification algorithms to locate displaced persons in makeshift shelters after the 2010 Haiti earthquake.

node.name: NBA-MVP-Prediction
node.description: This repository hosts the code for predicting the National Basketball Association (NBA) Most Valuable Player (MVP) for the 2017–2022 seasons.

node.name: Downloads_Cleaner
node.description: Personal project to practice Python skills while building something useful — a semi-automated way to clean the Downloads directory.

node.name: Stochastic-Volatility-Model
node.description: This repo includes the Python code for a Stochastic Volatility Model of Apple stock returns from 2007–2022.

node.name: MonteCarlo-Simulator
node.description: This repo contains the code for implementing a simple Monte Carlo simulator using a set of related Python classes.
